pages.text:
Events at SideBar
The Docket
This charming & quaint space can host 15 guests comfortably for a sit down dinner, or 32 in a cocktail setting. In this space you will find a fully stocked bar where your optional private bartender can serve your event.
+Addition of the
Lower Deck
will increase the number of guests to approximately 32-50 guests
+Addition of the
Lower & Upper Deck
will increase the number of guests to approximately 50-70 guests
Tours of our event space are available by appointment only, if you want to take a tour please email us at
events@sidebarlbg.com
Night Shift
This space offers two rooms and a private restroom on the second floor of SideBar. The longe can seat approximately 32 guests, and an additional 30 should you prefer a standing setting. The second room, contains a fully stocked bar where an optional private bartender will be able to service your next event!
Interested in hosting an event? Email us
events@sidebarlbg.com
